typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		product as string,
		version as string,
		channelcode as string,
		generated as string,
		contact as string,
		log as (logentry as (kanalnummer as string, start as string, end as string, kanalreferens as string, programtitel as string, serie as string, episod as string, filmcode as string, rerun as boolean, countryoforigin as string)[])
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
